page.title: 13Egton C.o.E. School
page.content:
**{Egton Church of England School}**
Our school is 111 years old and was built by the{Foster}family. It is built of stone and has a slate roof, and has the original fire places still intact.
The school is little, having 2 class rooms which are separated by a screen. The school has changed a bit since {1874,}it has a computer now (!) and we do different maths.
Outside the school we have a liitle kitchen joined on, in which our 2 cooks cook dinner for us to eat.
It is a pretty little school with lovely scenery all around it. The school's{30 pupils}took part in the {Domesday Project}in 1985.
